Yazun isṭerḥeb yis-sen. Xulfen lumuṛ n Qayṣer, qqaṛen belli yella ugellid nniḍen ițusemman Ɛisa.
S yimeslayen-agi, sḥeṛcen lɣaci akk-d lḥakem n temdint.
Ugin a sen-serrḥen i Yazun d watmaten nniḍen armi xellṣen lexṭiya.
Mi d-yewweḍ yiḍ, atmaten srewlen Bulus d Silas ɣer temdint n Biri. Mi wwḍen, kecmen ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail.

Lɣaci n dinna sṭerḥben yis-sen axiṛ n wid n temdint n Tiṣalunik , qeblen awal n Ṛebbi s wul yeṣfan. Kull ass țnadin di Tira iqedsen iwakken ad walin ma yella ț-țideț, yella di tira wayen i d-qqaṛen.
Aṭas seg-sen i gumnen ; ger iyunaniyen, aṭas n tilawin n laṣel d yergazen nniḍen i gumnen daɣen.
Lameɛna mi slan wat Isṛail n Tiṣalunik belli Bulus ițbecciṛ awal n Ṛebbi di temdint n Biri, uzzlen-d ad rwin lɣaci, a ten-cewwlen.
Dɣa atmaten srewlen imiren Bulus ɣer lǧiha n lebḥeṛ, ma d Silas d Timuti qqimen di temdint n Biri.
Widak yewwin Bulus, ssawḍen-t armi ț-țamdint n Atinya, syenna uɣalen-d ɣer temdint n Biri. Iweṣṣa-ten Bulus ad inin i Silas d Timuti, ur țɛeṭṭilen ara a t-leḥqen.
M'akken i gețṛaǧu Silas akk-d Timuti di temdint n Atinya, Bulus iɣaḍ-it lḥal mi gwala tamdint-nni teččuṛ d lmeṣnuɛat i țɛebbiden imezdaɣ-is.
Di lǧameɛ, yebda ițmeslay d wat Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi. Ițmeslay daɣen akk-d wid i d-ițemlili kull ass di tejmaɛt n temdint.

Kra n lɛulama yețfelsifen, yeɛni wid ițekkin di tejmaɛt n Ibikur akk-d Stuwis, bdan țmeslayen yid-es. Kra qqaṛen : D acu i gebɣa ad yini bu lehduṛ agi ? Wiyaḍ qqaṛen : Waqila yețbecciṛ iṛebbiten ibeṛṛaniyen ! Axaṭer Bulus yella ițbecciṛ-asen ɣef Sidna Ɛisa akk-d ḥeggu n lmegtin.
Dɣa wwin-t yid-sen ɣeryiwen wemkan n ccṛeɛ n temdint-nni iwumi qqaṛen Laryufaj, nnan-as : Nezmer a nẓer d acu-t uselmed agi ajdid i ɣ-d-tewwiḍ ?
Axaṭer nesla-yak tețmeslayeḍ-ed ɣef temsalin yessewhamen. Nebɣa a nissin lmeɛna-nsent.
Imezdaɣ n temdint n Atinya akk-d ibeṛṛaniyen i gzedɣen dinna, ḥemmlen ad sɛeddin lweqt-nsen anagar deg umeslay d usmeḥses i lexbaṛat ijdiden i d-ițeffɣen.
Bulus ibedd di tlemmast n Laryufaj yenna : Ay irgazen n temdint n Atinya, ẓriɣ-kkun tẓewṛem yerna tettabaɛem ddin di mkul ḥaǧa;

axaṭer ḥewwseɣ akk tamdint-nwen, walaɣ lmeṣnuɛat akk i tɛebdem ; ufiɣ daɣen yiwen n idebder anda yura : « I Ṛebbi-nni ur nețwassen ara. » Win akken i tɛebbdem mbla ma tessnem-t, d nețța i wen-țbecciṛeɣ.
D nețța i d-ixelqen ddunit d wayen yellan deg-s, d Bab igenwan d lqaɛa, ur yezdiɣ ara di leǧwameɛ i bnan ifassen n yemdanen.
Ur yeḥwaǧ ara ad xedmen fell-as yemdanen am akken yella wayen i t-ixuṣṣen, nețța i d-ițțaken i yemdanen meṛṛa tudert, ṛṛuḥ d wayen akk yellan.
Seg yiwen wemdan i d-ixleq akk leǧnas, yeɛmeṛ yis-sen ddunit ; yefka-yasen lewqat i tudert-nsen akk-d tilisa i tmura-nsen.
Sidi Ṛebbi ixdem annect-agi meṛṛa iwakken ad nadin fell-as ; ahat a t-afen s usferfed, nețța ur nebɛid ara ɣef mkul yiwen deg-nneɣ.
Yis i nesɛa tudert, i nteddu, i nețțili ; d ayen i d-nnan daɣen kra seg imedyazen-nwen : « ula d nukkni, darraw-is ! »
Ihi imi nella d arraw n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur ilaq ara a nɣil belli Ṛebbi yețțemcabi ɣer lmeṣnuɛ n ddheb, neɣ n lfeṭṭa, neɣ n wezṛu yețwanejṛen s ufus ț-țmusni n wemdan.
Sidi Ṛebbi isemmeḥ-asen i yemdanen asmi akken ur t-ssinen ara; tura issawel-asen-d akk di mkul amkan iwakken ad beddlen tikli, a d-uɣalen ɣuṛ-es.
Axaṭer yextaṛ ass i deg ara iḥaseb imdanen s lḥeqq, s wemdan i gextaṛ yerna yefka-yaɣ-d akk țțbut mi t-id-isseḥya si ger lmegtin.
Mi slan iheddeṛ-ed ɣef ḥeggu n lmegtin, kra țmesxiṛen, wiyaḍ qqaṛen-as : A k-nḥess ɣef wannect-agi tikkelt nniḍen...
Imiren, Bulus iṛuḥ yeǧǧa-ten.
Ɣas akken aṭas i gețmesxiṛen, llan kra deg-sen umnen, ddan yid-es . Yella gar-asen Dunisus i gțekkin di tejmaɛt n Laryufaj, yiwet n tmeṭṭut isem-is Damaris akk-d wiyaḍ.
Bulus iṛuḥ si temdint n Atinya ɣer temdint n Kurintus.

Yufa dinna yiwen wergaz n wat Isṛail, isem-is Akilas, laṣel-is n tmurt n Tqenṭert ; yewweḍ-ed deg ussan-nni kan si tmurt n Selyan nețța ț-țmeṭṭut-is Brisila, axaṭer Qayṣer Kludyus yumeṛ i wat Isṛail meṛṛa ad ffɣen si temdint n Ṛuma.
Imi Brisila d Akilas xeddmen iqiḍunen am Bulus, yeqqim ɣuṛ-sen xeddmen s tdukli.
Mkul ass n westeɛfu, Bulus ițmeslay di lǧameɛ, ițbecciṛ i wat Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen ttabaɛen ddin n wat Isṛail, iwakken ad amnen.
Mi d-usan Silas d Timuti si tmurt n Masidunya, Bulus yuɣal ițțelhay kan d ubecceṛ n wawal n Ṛebbi, ițbeggin ed i wat Isṛail belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ.

Imi i t-xulfen yerna regmen-t, Bulus yezwi icuḍaḍ-is, yenna-yasen : Cfut ur teqbilem ara leslak-agi, ddnub i yirawen-nwen ! Nekk ayen i yi-d-yewwi lḥal xedmeɣ-t. Ihi sya d asawen, ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer wat leǧnas ur nelli ara seg warraw n wat Isṛail.
Mi d-iffeɣ syenna, ikcem ɣer wexxam n Tit Justus, i gellan d amdan iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi ; axxam-is yezga-d tama n lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail.
Krisbus, ameqqran n lǧameɛ yumen s Ɛisa Lmasiḥ nețța d wat wexxam-is meṛṛa ; aṭas n wat kurintus daɣen i gumnen mi slan s wayen i d-yenna Bulus, dɣa țwaɣeḍsen deg waman.
Yiwen n yiḍ, Sidi Ṛebbi iweḥḥa yas-ed di targit i Bulus yenna-yas-d : Ur țțaggad ara, kemmel ehdeṛ ur țsusum ara !
Axaṭer aqli-n yid-ek ! Yiwen ur izmir ad issers afus-is fell-ak iwakken a k-yexdem cceṛ, axaṭer aṭas i gellan d ayla-w di temdint-agi.
Bulus yeqqim aseggas d sețța wagguren ger wat kurintus, isselmad asen awal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Di lweqt-nni i deg yella Galyun d lḥakem ɣef tmurt n Lakaya, at Isṛail msefhamen, ddukklen ɣef Bulus, wwin-t ɣer wexxam n ccṛeɛ, nnan :
Argaz-agi issamaṛ lɣaci ad ɛebden Ṛebbi s webrid ixulfen ccariɛa.
Mi gekker Bulus ad ihdeṛ, inṭeq Galyun yenna i wat Isṛail : Lemmer d lbaṭel neɣ d ayen n diri i gexdem, zemreɣ a wen ḥesseɣ am akken yella di lqanun ay at Isṛail ;
meɛna imi d amjadel ɣef yimeslayen, ɣef yismawen akk-d ccariɛa n Musa, ayagi d ccɣel-nwen ! Ur bɣiɣ ara ad ḥekmeɣ ɣef wannect-a.
Imiren issufeɣ-iten-id syenna.
Dɣa lɣaci mmɣen ɣef Sustin, ameqqran n lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail, ewten-t zdat wexxam n ccṛeɛ , Galyun ur s-tewqiɛ ara lmeɛna.

Bulus yerna aṭas n wussan di temdint n Kurintus ; syenna yeǧǧa atmaten di lehna, yerkeb lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Surya ; Brisila d Akilas ddan yid-es. Uqbel ad iṛuḥ si lmeṛṣa n temdint n Senkriya, iseṭṭel aqeṛṛuy-is axaṭer yefka lemɛahda i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Ifasus, mfaṛaqen : Bulus yeǧǧa iṛfiqen-is Akilas d Brisila, ma d nețța ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail, ițmeslay yid-sen.
Ḥellelen-t ad yernu kra wussan yid-sen, lameɛna ur yeqbil ara.
Yenna-yasen : A d-uɣaleɣ ɣuṛ-wen ma yebɣa Ṛebbi.
Yerkeb di lbabuṛ si temdint n Ifasus ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya ; syenna iṛuḥ a d-iẓer tajmaɛt n watmaten yellan di temdint n Lquds ; imiren iṣubb ɣer temdint n Antyuc.
Mi gesɛedda kra n wussan di temdint n Antyuc, yuɣal yeṭṭef abrid ɣer tmura n Galasya d Frijya, di mkul amkan yesseǧhad inelmaden di Liman.

Di lweqt-nni, yiwen wergaz n wat Isṛail yețțusemman Abulus, ilulen di temdint n Skandriya yellan di tmurt n Maṣeṛ, yusa-d ɣer temdint n Ifasus ; yezweṛ deg wawal yerna yessen mliḥ tira iqedsen.
Argaz-agi yelmed abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, iǧhed di liman, ițbecciṛ, yesselmad s teḥqiq ayen i d-qqaṛent tira iqedsen ɣef Ɛisa Lmasiḥ , ɣas akken d aɣḍas n Yeḥya kan i gessen.
Yebda ițmeslay ɛinani di lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail. Akilas d Brisila mi s-slan wwin-t yid-sen, sfehmen-as tideț n webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi akken tella.

Imi i gebɣa Abulus ad iɛeddi ɣer tmurt n Akaya, atmaten kksen-as akukru, uran tabṛaț i inelmaden n temdint n Kurintus iwakken ad stṛeḥben yis. Mi gewweḍ ɣer dinna, s ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi iɛawen aṭas widak yumnen ;
axaṭer yețṛuẓu ɛinani awal n lecyux n wat Isṛail zdat lɣaci meṛṛa ; yerna ițbeggin-ed s tira iqedsen belli d Ɛisa i d Lmasiḥ.
Yers-ed fell-awen Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen asmi i tumnem ? Rran-as : Leɛmeṛ nesli s Ṛṛuḥ-agi iqedsen.
Yenna-yasen : Anwa aɣḍas i-s-tețwaɣeḍsem ihi ? Rran-as : S weɣḍas n Yeḥya.
Bulus yenna-yasen : Yeḥya yesseɣḍes wid akk iqeblen ad beddlen tikli, yeqqaṛ i wegdud ad amnen s win ara d-yasen deffir-es, yeɛni s Sidna Ɛisa.
Mi slan i yimeslayen-agi, țwaɣeḍsen s yisem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Akken yessers Bulus ifassen-is fell-asen, ikcem-iten Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, bdan heddṛen s tutlayin ur nețwassen ara, yerna țcaren-d ayen i sen-d-yusan s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Imdanen-agi ad ilin di tnac yid-sen.
Dɣa Bulus ikcem ɣer lǧameɛ n wat Isṛail. Azal n tlata wagguren ițmeslay yid-sen, ițqenniɛ-iten iwakken ad amnen s wayen yeɛnan tagelda n Sidi Ṛebbi.

Lameɛna kra deg-sen yeqquṛ wul-nsen ugin ad amnen, rnan kkaten deg webrid n Sidna Ɛisa zdat lɣaci. Mi gwala annect-agi, Bulus iṭṭaxeṛ-asen, yewwi yid-es inelmaden, isselmad-iten kull ass deg wexxam n yiwen wergaz isem-is Tiranus.
Yeqqim dinna sin iseggasen armi imezdaɣ meṛṛa n tmurt n Asya, ama d at Isṛail ama d iyunaniyen, slan i wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Sidi Ṛebbi ixeddem lbeṛhanat imeqqranen s ifassen n Bulus ;
lɣaci wwḍen armi srusun ɣef yimuḍan ula ț-țimucwaṛin neɣ iceṭṭiḍen yennulen Bulus, dɣa imuḍan ḥellun, wid akk yețțumelken țeffɣen ten leǧnun.
Kra iseḥḥaren n wat Isṛail, ileḥḥun seg wemkan ɣer wayeḍ, ɛerden ad ssuffɣen leǧnun seg wid yețwamelken, qqaṛen-asen : S yisem n Sidna Ɛisa, win akken i gețbecciṛ Bulus, effɣet seg-es !
Widak ixeddmen annect-agi llan di sebɛa yid-sen, d arraw n Ciba yellan d yiwen si lmuqedmin imeqqranen n at Isṛail.
Lǧen-nni yerra-yasen-d : Ɛisa ssneɣ-t, ssneɣ daɣen anwa i d Bulus, ma d kunwi d acu-kkun ?
Argaz-nni i gezdeɣ lǧen, izḍem fell-asen yekkat-iten armi rewlen seg wexxam d iɛeryanen, yerna jerḥen.
At Isṛail akk-d iyunaniyen meṛṛa izedɣen tamdint n Ifasus slan s wayagi, ikcem-iten meṛṛa lxuf, ḥemmden isem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Aṭas seg wid i gumnen, usan-d ad qiṛṛen zdat wiyaḍ, ḥkan-d ayen xedmen.
Aṭas seg wid yellan xeddmen ssḥur, wwin-d tiktabin-nsen s wayes xeddmen ssḥur, sseṛɣen-tent zdat medden. Ufan belli azal n xemsin alef n twiztin i d ssuma-nsent.
S wakka i gewweḍ wawal n Sidi Ṛebbi ɣer mkul amkan, ițnerni s tezmert n Sidi Ṛebbi.

Mi gɛedda wayagi akk, Bulus yeqsed ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds, ad iɛeddi si tmura n Masidunya akk-d Akaya ; ixemmem deg iman-is yenna : « M'ara awḍeɣ ɣer dinna, ilaq-iyi daɣen ad ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temdint n Ṛuma.»
Iceggeɛ ɣer tmurt n Masidunya sin seg imɛawnen-is, Timuti d Irastus ; ma d nețța yerna kra n wussan di tmurt n Asya.
Di lweqt-nni, ɣef ddemma n webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi ikker ccwal d ameqqran di temdint n Ifasus.
Yella yiwen uḥeddad isem-is Dimitriyus, iṣenneɛ s lfeṭṭa leǧwameɛ imecṭaḥ i d-yețmettilen lǧameɛ n Artimis, yesserbeḥ aṭas ixeddamen-is.
Isnejmaɛ-iten nutni d wid i gxeddmen lfeṭṭa am nețța, yenna yasen : Ay atmaten ! Teẓram belli rrbeḥ-nneɣ itekk-ed si lxedma-agi ;

teẓram yerna teslam daɣen ɣef Bulus-agi issamnen aṭas n lɣaci di temdint n Ifasus d waṭas n tmura n Asya. Yessamen lɣaci, yewwi-ten d webrid-is mi sen-iqqaṛ : « Iṛebbiten agi ițwaxedmen s ifassen n wemdan mačči d iṛebbiten n tideț » ;

ur nuggad ara kan aț-țeɣli ṣṣenɛa-nneɣ, lameɛna nuggad ad sseɣlin lqima i lǧameɛ n Artimis tameqqrant, taṛebbiț-nneɣ, qṛib a s-kksen lɛaḍima s wayes tețwaɛbed di tmurt n Asya d ddunit meṛṛa.
Mi slan i lehduṛ-agi, ikcem-iten wurrif, bdan țɛeggiḍen : Ț-țameqqrant Artimis, taṛebbiț n at Ifasus !
Tețțucewwel akk temdint, lɣaci uzzlen ɣer wexxam n umezgun, seddan yid-sen Gayus akk-d Aristark yellan d imasiduniyen, d iṛfiqen n Bulus, ițṣafaṛen yid-es.
Bulus yebɣa ad ikcem di tlemmast n lɣaci-nni, lameɛna ugin-as inelmaden.
Ula d kra n lḥukkam imeqqranen n tmurt n Asya yellan d imdukkal-is, ceggɛen ɣuṛ-es iwakken a t-ḥellelen ur ițṛuḥ ara ɣer wexxam n umezgun.
Anejmaɛ-nni yexṛeb, kra țɛeggiḍen akka, wiyaḍ akken nniḍen yerna aṭas deg-sen ur ẓrin ara acu i d sebba n unejmaɛ-nni.
At Isṛail sbedden-d Alixandru ad immeslay i lɣaci. Iwehha-yasen ufus-is ad ssusmen, iwakken a d-ihdeṛ,
lameɛna mi t-ɛeqlen n wat Isṛail i gella, bdan țɛeggiḍen meṛṛa ɣef tikkelt azal n snat sswayeɛ : Ț-țameqqrant Artimis n at Ifasus !
Lameɛna lamin n temdint ihedden lɣaci, yenna-yasen : Ay at Ifasus, anwa ur neẓri ara belli tamdint n Ifasus ț-țaɛessast n lǧameɛ Artimis tameqqrant akk-d lmeṣnuɛ-ines i d-iɣlin seg igenni ?
Imi ayagi yiwen ur yezmir a t-yenkeṛ, ilaq ihi aț-țhennim iman-nwen, ur xeddmet acemma s tuffɣa n leɛqel !
Axaṭer irgazen-agi i d-tewwim ur ukiren lǧameɛ, ur rgimen Artimis taṛebbiț-nneɣ.
Ihi ma yella Dimitriyus d imdukkal-is sɛan sebba n uccetki ɣef yiwen, llan wussan n ccṛeɛ am akken llan lḥukkam ara ten-icaṛɛen , ad ṛuḥen ad ccetkin fell-asen.
Ma yella wayen nniḍen i tessuturem deg-sen, ad ḥekmen fell-asen deg unejmaɛ zdat lḥukkam.
Atan nuggad ad ccetkin fell-aɣ ɣef wayen yedṛan ass-agi imi ulac sebba ara nefk ɣef wunejmaɛ-agi. Mi gfukk ameslay, iserreḥ i lɣaci, yefra unejmaɛ.
Mi tethedden lḥala ifuk ccwal, imiren Bulus isnejmaɛ-ed inelmaden, yenha-ten, dɣa yeǧǧa-ten di lehna, yeṭṭef abrid ɣer tmurt n Masidunya.
Mi gezger tamurt n Masidunya, inehhu inelmaden, isseǧhad-iten s waṭas yimeslayen ; syenna ikemmel abrid ɣer tmurt n iyunaniyen anda yeqqim tlata wagguren.
Mi gțeddu ad yerkeb di lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Surya, yesla belli at Isṛail mcawaṛen iwakken a t-xedɛen ; dɣa ibeddel ṛṛay, iṭṭef abrid ad yuɣal ɣer tmurt n Masidunya.
Ddan yid-es : Subatir, mmi-s n Birus si temdint n Biri ; Arisṭark akk-d Skundus n temdint n Tiṣalunik, Gayus n temdint n Derba ; yedda daɣen Timuti, Tucik akk-d Trufim n tmurt n Asya.
Wigi zwaren ɣer zdat, eṛǧan-aɣ di temdint n Truwas,
ma d nukni mi gɛedda Lɛid n weɣṛum mbla iɣes ( tamtunt ), nerkeb lbabuṛ si temdint n Filibus ; xemsa wussan mbeɛd, nelḥeq-iten ɣer temdint n Truwas, anda nesɛedda sebɛa wussan.
Ass amezwaru n dduṛt nennejmaɛ a nebḍu aɣṛum iwakken ad nemekti Lmasiḥ, Bulus ițmeslay nețța d inelmaden. Imi ilaq ad iṛuḥ azekka-nni, ikemmel yid-sen awal armi i gneṣṣef yiḍ ;
taɣuṛfeț anda i nennejmaɛ, ceɛlent deg-s aṭas n teftilin.
Yiwen ilemẓi, isem-is Utikus, yella yeqqim ɣef yiri n ṭṭaq. Imi i gɛeṭṭel Bulus deg umeslay, Utikus yewwi-t nuddam ; yeɣli-d si leɛli wis tlata armi d lqaɛa, mi t-id-refden, ufan-t yemmut.
Bulus iṣubb-ed, yekna ɣuṛ-es, iddem-it ger iɣallen-is yenna : Ur țțaggadet ara, mazal deg-s taṛwiḥt, idder.
Syenna yuɣal yuli ar tɣuṛfeț, yebḍa aɣṛum ; mi ččan, ikemmel yid-sen ameslay armi d lefjer, dɣa iṛuḥ.
Ilemẓi-nni, wwin-t yedder ; dɣa yers-ed lfeṛḥ deg ulawen-nsen.
Nukni nerkeb lbabuṛ, nezwar Bulus ɣer temdint n Assus anda ara nemyagar yid-es axaṭer yebɣa ad iṛuḥ ɣef wuḍaṛ.
Mi i ɣ-d-yelḥeq di temdint n Assus, yerkeb yid-nneɣ di lbabuṛ ɣer temdint n Mitilan ;
syenna nkemmel abrid di lebḥeṛ, newweḍ azekka-nni zdat temdint n Ciyu, sellazekka-nni newweḍ ɣer temdint n Samus ; ass wis ṛebɛa newweḍ ɣer temdint n Mili.

Bulus yebɣa ad iɛeddi rrif n temdint n Ifasus mbla ma yeḥbes, iwakken ur isṛuḥuy ara lweqt di tmurt n Asya. Ițɣawal iwakken ma yella wamek, ad yaweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds ass n lɛid n wass wis xemsin.
Si temdint n Mili, Bulus iceggeɛ ɣer imeqqranen n tejmaɛt n temdint n Ifasus iwakken a d-asen.
Mi d-wwḍen ɣuṛ-es, yenna-yasen : Tesnem si zik tikli-inu yid-wen seg wass amezwaru mi d-kecmeɣ tamurt n Asya.
Qedceɣ ɣef Sidi Ṛebbi s wannuz d imeṭṭawen ger iɣeblan d lemḥayen i yi-sseṛwan wat Isṛail.
Țbecciṛeɣ-awen rniɣ slemdeɣ kkun ama zdat lɣaci ama deg ixxamen-nwen, mbla ma ffreɣ acemma seg wayen i kkun-inefɛen.
Țbecciṛeɣ i wat Isṛail d iyunaniyen a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi yerna ad amnen s Sidna Ɛisa.
Tura, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen iḥṛes-iyi ad ṭṭfeɣ abrid ɣer temdint n Lquds, ur ẓriɣ ara d acu ara yedṛun yid-i.
Si temdint ɣer tayeḍ, Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen ițxebbiṛ-iyi-d belli țṛaǧun-iyi leḥbus d wussan n ddiq.

Lameɛna tudert-iw ur s-fkiɣ ara lqima, ur ț-ḥsibeɣ ara eɛzizet fell-i ; a wi yufan kan ad kemmleɣ tikli-inu akk-d Ṛebbi, ad xedmeɣ s lfeṛḥ ayen i yi-d-ifka Sidna Ɛisa, iwakken ad beccṛeɣ lexbaṛ n lxiṛ n ṛṛeḥma n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Tura ẓriɣ belli ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țeẓrem udem-iw, kunwi iwumi beccṛeɣ tageldit n Sidi Ṛebbi.
Daymi i wen-d-qqaṛeɣ ass-agi, ma yella yiwen yeffeɣ i webrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, ddnub i yiri-s,
imi i wen-beccṛeɣ ayen akk yellan di leqsed n Sidi Ṛebbi, ur ffireɣ ula d acemma fell-awen.
Ɛasset ɣef yiman-nwen, ɛasset ɣef tqeḍɛit ɣef i kkun-iwekkel Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen. Ilit d iɛessasen ɣef tejmaɛt n Ṛebbi i d-iḥerr s idammen n Mmi-s.
Sriɣ belli m'ara ṛuḥeɣ, a d-kecmen gar-awen wuccanen iweɛṛen, wid ur nețsamaḥ ara i tqeḍɛit ;
a d-kkren daɣen gar-awen yergazen ara islemden leḥwayeǧ iɛewjen iwakken ad jebden inelmaden ɣuṛ-sen.
Ɣuṛ-wat ihi, ɛasset iman-nwen ! Mmektit-ed belli azal n tlata iseggasen, ur ḥbiseɣ am yiḍ am ass, nehhuɣ mkul yiwen seg-wen s imeṭṭawen.
Tura a kkun-ǧǧeɣ ger ifassen n Sidi Ṛebbi d ṛṛeḥma n wawal-is; D nețța i gzemren a kkun-isseǧhed, a wen-d-yefk lweṛt i kunwi akk yellan d ayla-s.
Ur ḍmiɛeɣ, ama d ddheb ama d idrimen neɣ leḥwayeǧ n yiwen deg-wen.
Teẓram s yiman-nwen belli s ifassen-iw i xeddmeɣ iwakken ad ɛeyyceɣ iman-iw akk-d wid yellan yid-i.
Di mkul lḥaǧa, ssekneɣ-awen amek ara txedmem iwakken aț-țɛiwnem wid ur nezmir ara. Mmektit-ed imeslayen n Sidna Ɛisa mi d-yenna : « Win ițseddiqen ițțubarek akteṛ n win iteṭṭfen ssadaqa ».
Mbeɛd imeslayen-agi, yuɣal ɣef tgecrar, yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi yid-sen.
Sṭeṛḍqen s imeṭṭawen, ṭṭfen-t ger iɣallen-nsen, selmen akk fell-as ;
ḥeznen aṭas imi i sen-d-yenna : « Ur tețțuɣalem ara aț-țeẓrem udem- iw. » Syenna ddan yid-es armi d lbabuṛ.
Mi nemfaṛaq yid-sen, nerkeb lbabuṛ nṛuḥ qbala ɣer temdint n Kus, azekka-nni ɣer temdint n Ṛudus ; syenna nkemmel abrid ɣer temdint n Batara.
Mi nufa lbabuṛ ara izegren ɣer tmurt n Finisya, nerkeb deg-s nṛuḥ.
Mi nqubel tigzirt n Qubṛus, neǧǧa-ț ɣer tama tazelmaṭ, nkemmel abrid nneɣ ɣer tmurt n Surya, newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sur imi dinna ara yessers lbabuṛ sselɛa-s.
Mi nufa dinna inelmaden, nesɛedda sebɛa wussan yid-sen ; s Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen, inelmaden-nni nnan-as i Bulus : Ur țțali ara ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Mi ɛeddan wussan-nni, nekker a nṛuḥ, ddan yid-nneɣ armi neffeɣ i temdint, nutni ț-țilawin-nsen d warraw-nsen. Mi newweḍ ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ nuɣal ɣef tgecrar, nedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi.
Mi nemsalam yid-sen, nerkeb di lbabuṛ nṛuḥ ; nutni uɣalen ɣer yexxamen-nsen,
nukkni nkemmel abrid s lbabuṛ si temdint n Sur armi ț-țamdint n Bṭulimays, neẓra dinna atmaten, neqqim yid-sen yiwen wass.
Azekka-nni nṛuḥ, newweḍ ɣer Qiṣarya ; nekcem ɣer wexxam n Filbas, win ițbecciṛen lexbaṛ n lxiṛ, nețța yellan d yiwen si sebɛa-nni ițwaxtaṛen di temdint n Lquds ; neqqim ɣuṛ-es.
Filbas-nni, ɣuṛ-es ṛebɛa yessi-s urɛad zwiǧent, țxebbiṛent-ed s wayen i tent-id-ițțasen s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Ɛeddan kra n wussan, mi d yewweḍ yiwen seg watmaten isem-is Agabus, ula d nețța ițxebbiṛ-ed s ɣuṛ Sidi Ṛebbi, iṣubb-ed si tmurt n Yahuda, yusa-d ɣuṛ-nneɣ.

Iddem tabagust n Bulus, icudd idaṛṛen-is d ifassen-is, yenna : Atan wayen i d-iqqaṛ Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen : akka ara cidden wat Isṛail di temdint n Lquds bab n tbagust-agi, a t-sellmen ger ifassen n ikafriwen.
Mi nesla annect-agi, nukkni d watmaten n Sizari nḥellel Bulus iwakken ur ițțali ara ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Dɣa Bulus yerra-yasen : Acu i kkun-yuɣen mi tețrum akka armi tgezmem tasa-w ? Nekk qebleɣ mačči kan ad țwacuddeɣ, lameɛna qebleɣ ula d lmut di temdint n Lquds ɣef ddemma n yisem n Sidna Ɛisa.
Imi yugi ad yaɣ awal-nneɣ, ur nketteṛ ara fell-as lehduṛ nenna : A neǧǧ lebɣi n Sidi Ṛebbi ad yedṛu !
Akken ɛeddan wussan-nni, nhegga iman-nneɣ a nali ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Kra inelmaden n Qiṣarya ddan yid-nneɣ, wwin-aɣ ɣer yiwen wergaz wuɣuṛ ara nili, isem-is Mansun, n tegzirt n Qubṛus, d yiwen seg inelmaden imezwura.
Mi newweḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds, sṭreḥben yis-nneɣ watmaten s lfeṛḥ.
Azekka-nni, yedda yid-nneɣ Bulus ɣer wexxam n Yeɛqub anda nnejmaɛen imeqqranen n tejmaɛt.
Mi gsellem fell-asen, Bulus yeḥka-yasen ayen akk ixdem yis Sidi Ṛebbi ger leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail.
Mi slan ayagi, ḥemmden Sidi Ṛebbi nnan-as : Twalaḍ a gma-tneɣ acḥal n luluf n wat Isṛail i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa yerna ṭṭfen akk di ccariɛa n Musa.

Atan slan wat Isṛail n temdint n Lquds belli tesselmadeḍ i wat Isṛail yellan ger leǧnas ad ǧǧen ccariɛa n Musa ; slan daɣen teqqaṛeḍ asen : « ur seḍhaṛet ara i warrac nwen, ur ttabaɛet ara leɛwayed i ɣ-d-ǧǧan lejdud ».
Acu ara nexdem tura ? Mbla ccekk ad slen belli tusiḍ-ed ;
ihi exdem ayen ara k-d-nini : llan gar-aneɣ ṛebɛa yergazen i gefkan lemɛahda i Sidi Ṛebbi,

awi-ten yid-ek, ssizdeg iman-ik yid-sen, seṛṛef fell-asen iwakken ad seṭṭlen iqeṛṛay-nsen ; s wakkagi ad ẓren belli ayen akk slan fell-ak d lekdeb yerna ad walin mazal teṭṭfeḍ di ccariɛa n Musa.
Ma d at leǧnas i gumnen s Sidna Ɛisa, nura-yasen : Ad ṭṭixṛen i wučči n weksum ițțunefken d asfel i lmeṣnuɛat d ssadat, i tissit n idammen, i lmal yemmuṛḍsen akk-d yir tikli.

Azekka-nni, Bulus yewwi yid-es ṛebɛa yergazen-nni, issazdeg iman-is yid-sen, ikcem yid-sen ɣer wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen iwakken ad ixebbeṛ lmuqeddem ɣef lweqt i deg ara fakken wussan n uzizdeg-nsen, yeɛni ass i deg ara yefk mkul yiwen seg-sen lweɛda-ines.
Mi qṛib ad fakken sebɛa wussan-nni n usizdeg, at Isṛail n tmurt n Asya walan Bulus di lǧameɛ iqedsen. Sekkren ccwal ger lɣaci dɣa ṭṭfen-t.

Bdan țɛeggiḍen : Ay at Isṛail, ɛiwnet-aɣ ! Atah wergaz-nni ițbecciṛen di mkul amkan i yemdanen meṛṛa. Iheddeṛ ayen n diri ɣef wegdud-nneɣ, ɣef wemkan-agi iqedsen, isselmad ayen ur teqbil ara ccariɛa-nneɣ, yewwi-d iyunaniyen ɣer lǧameɛ, issenǧes amkan-agi iqedsen !
Nnan-d ayagi axaṭer walan yid-es Trufim di temdint, ɣilen issekcem-it ɣer daxel n lǧameɛ iqedsen.
Ikker ccwal di temdint meṛṛa ; uzzlen-d yemdanen si mkul tama. Sṭfen Bulus, zzuɣṛen-t beṛṛa n wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen, sekkṛen-d tiwwura.
Mi țeddun lɣaci a t-nɣen, yewweḍ lexbaṛ ɣer lqebṭan n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman tamdint n Lquds meṛṛa tenhewwal.
Imiren kan yessawel i ifesyanen d lɛeskeṛ-nsen, uzzlen ɣer lɣaci. Mi walan lqebṭan akk-d lɛeskeṛ-is, ttaxṛen-as i Bulus.
Dɣa lqebṭan iqeṛṛeb ɣer Bulus, yefka lameṛ a t-ṭṭfen, a t-cudden s snat snasel ; dɣa isteqsa anwa-t, d acu i gexdem.
Meɛna lɣaci-nni, kra țɛeggiḍen akka, wiyaḍ akken nniḍen. Imi ur ifhim ara wayen i s-d-nnan si leɛyaḍ-nni, yumeṛ a t-awin ɣer lbeṛj.
Mi gewweḍ Bulus ɣer tseddaṛin, refden-t lɛeskeṛ iwakken a t-sellken si ger ifassen n lɣaci.
Axaṭer lɣaci-nni ttabaɛen-t țɛeggiḍen : « Enɣ-it ! Enɣ-it !... »
Mi qṛib a t-skecmen ɣer zdaxel n lbeṛj, Bulus yenna-yas i lqebṭan : Semmeḥ-iyi, zemreɣ a k-d-iniɣ yiwen n wawal ? Yerra-yas : Tessneḍ aț-țhedṛeḍ tayunanit ?
Mačči d kečč i d amaṣri-nni i gsekkren ccwal ussan-agi iɛeddan, i gessufɣen yid-es ṛebɛa alaf n iqettalen ɣer lxali ?
Bulus yenna-yas : Xaṭi ! Nekk n wat Isṛail, luleɣ di temdint n Sars yellan di tmurt n Silisya ; d amezdaɣ n temdint mechuṛen. Di leɛnaya-k serreḥ-iyi ad hedṛeɣ i lɣaci-yagi.
Lqebṭan iɛemmed-as, dɣa Bulus ibedd ɣef tseddaṛin, iwehha i lɣaci s ufus-is, dɣa ssusmen. Yenṭeq s tɛibṛanit, yenna-yasen :
Ay atmaten akken ma tellam dagi meẓẓi meqqeṛ, semḥesset ed tura a wen-d-iniɣ ayen s wayes ara dafɛeɣ ɣef yiman-iw !
Mi slan iheddeṛ-asen-d s tɛibṛanit, ssusmen meṛṛa iwakken a s-slen. Dɣa yenna :

Nekk n wat Isṛail, ț-țideț luleɣ di temdint n Sars n tmurt n Silisya, lameɛna țțuṛebbaɣ di temdint-agi n Lquds. Lliɣ d anelmad n ccix Gamalyel s yiman-is ; yesselmed-iyi akken ilaq amek ara tebɛeɣ ccariɛa i d-ǧǧan lejdud-nneɣ. Ttabaɛeɣ seg ul-iw abrid n Sidi Ṛebbi, am kunwi ass-agi.
Qehṛeɣ armi d lmut wid ittabaɛen abrid-agi ajdid n Sidna Ɛisa, am yergazen am tlawin, țțawiɣ-ten-id ɣer leḥbus țwarzen.

Lmuqeddem ameqqran ț-țejmaɛt n lɛuqal atnan d inigan ma bɣan a d-cehden ; d nutni s yiman-nsen i yi-d-yefkan tibṛatin i watmaten n Dimecq, syenna a d-awiɣ țwarzen ɣer temdint n Lquds, wid akk yumnen s webrid-agi, iwakken a ten-ɛaqben.
Lliɣ tedduɣ deg webrid, qṛib ad awḍeɣ ɣer temdint n Dimecq. Aț-țili d țnaṣfa n wass, taswiɛt kan, yiwet n tafat tameqqrant tewwet-ed seg igenni, tețfeǧǧiǧ, tezzi-yi-d.
Ɣliɣ ɣer lqaɛa, sliɣ i yiwen n ṣṣut i yi-d-iqqaṛen : Caɛul, a Caɛul, acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ?
Nniɣ-as : Anwa-k, a Sidi ? Yenna-yi-d : Nekk d Ɛisa Anaṣari, win akken i tețqehhiṛeḍ.
Wid yellan yid-i walan tafat-nni, lameɛna ur slin ara i ṣṣut i yi-d iheddṛen, dɣa nniɣ : Acu i tebɣiḍ a t-xedmeɣ a Sidi ?
Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yi-d : Ekker, ṛuḥ ɣer Dimecq, dinna ara k-d-inin ayen akk ilaqen a t-txedmeḍ.
Imi iyi-tesderɣel tafat-nni s ufeǧǧeǧ-ines, d imdukkal-iw i yi ṭṭfen afus armi wwḍeɣ ɣer Dimecq.
Yella dinna yiwen wergaz isem-is Ananyas, d argaz iḍuɛen Sidi Ṛebbi, yerna yettabaɛ ccariɛa ; at Isṛail meṛṛa izedɣen di temdint n Dimecq țcehhiden fell-as s lxiṛ.
Yusa-d ɣuṛ-i yenna-yi-d : A Caɛul a gma, Sidi Ṛebbi yerra-yak-d iẓri ! Di teswiɛt-nni, yuɣal-iyi-d yezṛi, dɣa walaɣ-t.
Ananyas yenna-yi-d : Sidi Ṛebbi n lejdud-nneɣ yextaṛ ik aț-țissineḍ lebɣi-ines, aț-țwaliḍ s wallen-ik win yellan d Aḥeqqi, aț-țesleḍ imeslayen seg yimi-is .
axaṭer aț-țuɣaleḍ d inigi-ines zdat yemdanen meṛṛa ɣef wayen akk i teẓriḍ d wayen iwumi tesliḍ.
Tura d acu i tețṛaǧuḍ ? Kker aț-tețwaɣeḍseḍ, aț-țizdigeḍ seg ddnubat-ik m'ara tedɛuḍ s yisem-is.
Asmi uɣaleɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds, yiwen n wass lliɣ țẓallaɣ deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen, iweḥḥa-yi-d Sidi Ṛebbi,
walaɣ Sidna Ɛisa yenna-yi-d : Ffeɣ s lemɣawla si temdint n Lquds, axaṭer ur qebblen ara ayen s wayes ara tcehdeḍ fell-i.
Nniɣ : A Sidi, ssnen-iyi ! Sran s yiman nsen belli ttabaɛeɣ si lǧameɛ ɣer wayeḍ wid yumnen yis-ek iwakken a ten-erreɣ ɣer lḥebs ad țewten.
Ula d Stifan inigi-inek, mi ssuzlen idammen-is lliɣ dinna, qebleɣ at nɣen yerna ɛusseɣ leḥwayeǧ n wid i t-yenɣan.
Dɣa Sidi Ṛebbi yenna-yi-d : Ṛuḥ a k-ceggɛeɣ ɣer lebɛid ɣer wat leǧnas ur nelli ara n wat Isṛail.
Smeḥsisen-as armi d awal-agi imiren ɛeggḍen nnan : Ekkset si ddunit argaz am wagi ! Ur t-țaǧǧat ara ad yidir !
Țɛeggiḍen, ṭeggiṛen leḥwayeǧ nsen, ssafagen aɣebbaṛ ɣer igenni.
Lqebṭan n Ṛuman yumeṛ ad skecmen Bulus ɣer lbeṛj, a t-ewten s ujelkkaḍ ( s ucelliṭ ) iwakken ad issinen sebba ɣef wacu țɛeggiḍen fell-as.
Mi t-cudden s tɣeggadin, Bulus yenna i lqebṭan yellan dinna : Eɛni iserreḥ-awen lqanun aț țewtem aṛumani s ujelkkaḍ uqbel ad iɛeddi di ccṛeɛ ?
Ɣef yimeslayen-agi, lqebṭan-nni iṛuḥ ɣer wemdebbar ameqqran yenna-yas : Ḥader aț-țewteḍ argaz-agi ! D aṛumani !
Amdebbar ameqqran mi d-yusa ɣer Bulus, yenna-yas : Ț-țideț kečč d aṛumani ? Ih, d aṛumani i lliɣ !
Amdebbar ameqqran yenna : Nekk aṭas n yedrimen i fkiɣ iwakken ad uɣaleɣ d aṛumani. Bulus yerra-yas : Nekk, seg wasmi i d-luleɣ i rseɣ di lekwaɣeḍ d aṛumani.
Imiren widak i d-ikkren a t wten, ṭṭaxṛen-as. Lqebṭan ameqqran s yiman-is yuggad mi geẓra Bulus d aṛumani yerna icudd-it.

Azekka-nni, imi i gebɣa ad yissin wemdebbar ameqqran ɣef wacu i d-ccetkan fell-as wat Isṛail, iserreḥ i Bulus, yumeṛ i lmuqedmin akk-d usqamu n ccṛeɛ ad nnejmaɛen. Dɣa yewwi-d Bulus isbedd-it-id zdat-nsen.
Lmuqeddem ameqqran Ananyas yumeṛ i wid yellan zdat-es, a t-wten ɣer yimi.
Dɣa Bulus yenna : A k-id-iwet Ṛebbi a bu sin wudmawen ! Teqqimeḍ aț-țḥekmeḍ fell-i s ccariɛa, lameɛna kečč s yiman-ik txulfeḍ-ț imi tumreḍ ad iyi wten.
Widak yellan zdat-es nnan-as : Tregmeḍ lmuqeddem ameqqran n Ṛebbi !
Bulus yenna-yasen : Ur ẓriɣ ara ay atmaten belli d nețța i d lmuqeddem ameqqran, axaṭer yura di ccariɛa : Ur țekkes ara leqdeṛ ɣef lḥakem n wegdud-ik.

Bulus, mi gwala deg unejmaɛ-nni azgen deg-sen d isaduqiyen, azgen nniḍen d ifariziyen, iɛeggeḍ gar-asen, yenna : Ay atmaten, nekk d afarizi, d mmi-s n ufarizi ; ɣef ddemma n usirem i nesɛa di ḥeggu n lmegtin i d-beddeɣ ɣer ccṛeɛ ass-agi !
Mi d-yenna ayagi, ikker umennuɣ ger ifariziyen d isaduqiyen ; dɣa yebḍa unejmaɛ-nni.
Axaṭer isaduqiyen qqaṛen ulac ḥeggu, ulac lmalayekkat, ulac leṛwaḥ ; ma d ifariziyen, nutni umnen s wannect agi.
Ikker umennuɣ gar-asen ; kra n lɛulama n ccariɛa n tejmaɛt n ifariziyen kkren iwakken ad ḥudden Bulus, nnan : Ur nufi ara ayen n diri deg wemdan-agi. Yezmer lḥal ihdeṛ-as-d Ṛebbi neɣ lmelk !
Imi ițțimɣuṛ umenɣi, lqebṭan ameqqran yugad ad feṛqen Bulus d iftaten. Yumeṛ i lɛeskeṛ ad ṛuḥen a t-id-kksen si tlemmast-nsen, a t awin ɣer lbeṛj.
Azekka-nni deg iḍ, Sidna Ɛisa iḍheṛ-as-d i Bulus yenna-yas : Ur țțaggad ara, axaṭer am akken tcehdeḍ fell-i di temdint n Lquds, ilaq daɣen aț-țcehdeḍ fell-i di temdint n Ṛuma.
Mi guli wass, at Isṛail xedmen tiḥileț, msefhamen, gullen ur ččin ur swin alamma nɣan Bulus.
Wid akk i s-ixedmen taxazabit agi, llan akteṛ n ṛebɛin yid-sen.
Ṛuḥen ad ẓren imeqqranen d lmuqedmin akk-d lɛuqal nnan asen : Neggul s limin ameqqran, ur nečči acemma alamma nenɣa Bulus.
Tura ihi, init-as i lqebṭan ameqqran a t-id-yawi ɣer unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ zdat-wen, amzun tebɣam a s-tɛiwdem abeḥḥet ; ma d nukkni, a nheggi iman-nneɣ a t-nenɣ uqbel a d-yaweḍ ɣer dagi.
Lameɛna mmi-s n weltma-s n Bulus imi gesla s tḥileț-nni i s heggan, iṛuḥ ɣer lbeṛj anda yețwaḥbes Bulus, a s-yessiweḍ lexbaṛ.
Bulus yessawel-ed i yiwen si lfesyanat, yenna-yas : Awi aqcic-agi ɣer lqebṭan ameqqran, axaṭer yesɛa awal ara s-yini.
Lfesyan yewwi yid-es aqcic-nni ɣer lqebṭan ameqqran, yenna-yas : Bulus ameḥbus-nni yessawel iyi-d iḥellel-iyi iwakken a k-d-awiɣ aqcic-agi, yesɛa awal ara k-d-yini.
Lqebṭan ameqqran iddem aqcic-nni seg ufus, ɛezlen iman-nsen ɣer ṭṭeṛf ; yenna-yas : D acu i tebɣiḍ a yi-t-id-tiniḍ ?
Yerra-yas : At Isṛail msefhamen a k-d ḍelben aț-țawiḍ Bulus azekka ɣer zdat unejmaɛ n ccṛeɛ, ufan-d sebba a s-ɛiwden abeḥḥet ɣef temsalt-is.
Ur țțaɣ ara awal-nsen, axaṭer akteṛ n ṛebɛin deg-sen ḥeyylen-as, gullen s limin ameqqran ur tețțen ur tessen alamma nɣan-t. Tura heggan iman-nsen, țṛaǧun anagar lebɣi-k.
Amdebbar ameqqran iserreḥ-as i weqcic-nni ad iṛuḥ, yenna-yas : Ur qqaṛ i yiwen belli tessaweḍed iyi-d lexbaṛ-agi.
Yuɣal issawel i sin lfesyanat, yenna-yasen : Heggit mitin iɛeskṛiwen, sebɛin yemnayen akk-d mitin iɛeskṛiwen i gteddun s imezṛagen, ad ṛuḥen ɣef tesɛa n yiḍ ɣer Qiṣarya.
Heggit daɣen iɛewdiwen iwakken ad ssiwḍen Bulus di laman ɣer lḥakem Filiks.
Yura tabṛaț-agi i lḥakem Filiks :
« Nekk Kludyus Lizyas i lḥakem ameqqran Filiks, sslam fell-ak !
At Isṛail ṭṭfen argaz-agi teddun a t-nɣen, mi wwḍeɣ nekk d lɛeskeṛ-iw, sellkeɣ-t-id si ger ifassen-nsen. Imi sliɣ laṣel-is d aṛumani,
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ sebba ɣef wacu ccetkan fell-as ; wwiɣ-t ɣer zdat unejmaɛ nsen.
Ufiɣ belli sebba ɣef wacu i ccetkan fell-as, d ayen yeɛnan ccariɛa-nsen, lameɛna ur ixdim acemma yuklalen lmut neɣ lḥebs.
Mi sliɣ ḥeyylen-as wat Isṛail, ceggɛeɣ-t-in ɣuṛ-ek. Ma d ixṣimen-is nniɣ-asen a n-ṛuḥen ɣuṛ-ek ad ccetkin fell-as. Sǧiɣ-k di lehna !
Akken i ten-d-yewweḍ lameṛ, iɛeskṛiwen wwin Bulus deg yiḍ ɣer temdint n Antibatris.
Azekka-nni uɣalen ɣer lbeṛj, ǧǧan imnayen ad kemmlen abrid yid-es.
Mi wwḍen ɣer temdint n Qiṣarya, wwin Bulus ɣer lḥakem Filiks, rnan fkan-as tabṛaț-nni.
Lḥakem yeɣṛa tabṛaț-nni, isteqsa anta i ț-țamurt n Bulus. Mi gesla si tmurt n Silisya i gella,
yenna-yas : M'ara d-awḍen yexṣimen iccetkan fell-ak, a k-sleɣ . Dɣa yumeṛ a t-ɛassen di lbeṛj n Hiṛudus. At Isṛail cccetkan ɣef Bulus
Mi ɛeddan xemsa wussan, lmuqeddem ameqqran Ananyas iṣubb-ed ɣer Qiṣarya nețța d kra n lɛuqal n wat Isṛail akk-d yiwen ubugaṭu isem-is Tertulus ; usan-d ɣer lḥakem ad ccetkin ɣef Bulus.
Mi d-ssawlen i Bulus, Tertulus yebda accetki fell-as s yimeslayen agi :
A lḥakem ameqqran ! S uḍebbaṛ-ik yelhan i d-yers lxiṛ d lehna ɣef tmurt-agi ! Ɣef wayagi, a Filiks ameqqran, ncekkeṛ-ik meṛṛa di mkul amkan ;
lameɛna iwakken ur k-nețɛeṭṭil ara aṭas, di leɛnaya-k semḥess-ed i kra n yimeslayen-agi ara k-d-nini :
Argaz-agi d țerka, iskker ccwal ger wat Isṛail n ddunit meṛṛa, d nețța i d ameqqran n tejmaɛt n inaṣariyen.
Yeɛṛed ad issenǧes ula d lǧameɛ iqedsen. Mi t-neṭṭef, nebɣa a neḥkem fell-as s ccariɛa-nneɣ,
lameɛna yewweḍ-ed lqebṭan ameqqran Lizyas, ikkes-aɣ-t s ddreɛ si ger ifassen-nneɣ,
yerna yumeṛ i wid iccetkan fell-as a d-asen ad ccetkin ɣuṛ-ek. Tura tzemreḍ s yiman-ik a t-tbeḥteḍ, iwakken aț-țesleḍ seg yimi-s wayen akk i ɣef neccetka fell-as.
At Isṛail yellan dinna, cehden akk belli akka i gella lḥal.
Mi i s-iwehha lḥakem i Bulus iwakken a d-ihdeṛ, Bulus yenna : Sriɣ aṭas iseggasen aya i telliḍ d lḥakem ɣef wegdud-agi ; ihi s laman ara d-qeddmeɣ tamsalt-iw zdat-ek.
Ur wwiḍen ara tnac wussan segmi uliɣ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ɛebdeɣ Ṛebbi, tzemreḍ aț-țesteqsiḍ s yiman-ik.
Ulac win i yi-d-yufan deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen țemjadaleɣ nekk d walebɛaḍ, ulac daɣen win i yi-d-yufan di leǧwameɛ n wat Isṛail neɣ di temdint sekkreɣ ccwal ger lɣaci.
Ur zmiren ara a d-awin țțbut n wayen akka i ɣef d-ccetkan fell-i.

Zemreɣ a d-iniɣ zdat-ek a lḥakem Filiks : Ṛebbi i ɛebbdeɣ, d win akken ɛebden lejdud-iw ; s tideț umneɣ s webrid-agi ajdid i ɣef d-qqaṛen : « ixulef abrid-nsen » ; lameɛna umneɣ s wayen akk yuran di ccariɛa n Musa akk-d lenbiya.
Sɛiɣ asirem ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi -- am akken i t-sɛan ula d nutni -- belli a d-ḥyun yemdanen meṛṛa ama d iḥeqqiyen ama d wid ixedmen cceṛ.
Daymi țɛassaɣ iman-iw kull ass, iwakken ad sɛuɣ ul yeṣfan zdat Ṛebbi akk-d yemdanen.
Acḥal n iseggasen, nekk ɛaceɣ di lɣeṛba ; usiɣ-ed iwakken a d-awiɣ kra n yedrimen i d-jemɛeɣ d lemɛawna i igellilen n tmurt-iw yerna wwiɣ-ed daɣen lweɛdat i Sidi Ṛebbi.
Atan wamek i yi-d-ufan deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen : ufan-iyi-d akken kan i ssezdegeɣ iman-iw akken i d-tenna ccariɛa; ur iyi-d zzin imdanen ur yelli ccwal
yerna d at Isṛail n tmurt n Asya i gellan dinna, d nutni i glaq ad bedden zdat-ek ma sɛan kra ɣef wacu ara ccetkin fell-i.
Neɣ m'ulac wid yellan dagi, a d-inin d acu ufan deg-i n diri mi beddeɣ zdat unejmaɛ-nsen n ccṛeɛ ;
anagar ma yella ɣef wawal-nni i d-nniɣ s leɛyaḍ gar-asen : « imi umneɣ s ḥeggu n lmegtin, i d-beddeɣ ass-agi ɣer ccṛeɛ zdat-wen ! »
Filiks yesnen akken ilaq abrid n Lmasiḥ, yenna-yasen : Uɣalet-ed m'ara d-yaweḍ lqebṭan Lizyas, imiren ad ẓreɣ tamsalt-nwen.
Yefka lameṛ i yiwen n lfesyan ad iɛass Bulus, lameɛna a s-yeǧǧ kra n țesriḥ, yerna ad yeǧǧ imdukkal-is a d-reSSun fell-ass.
Mi ɛeddan kra wussan, yusa-d Filiks akk-d țmeṭṭut-is Drusila, nețțat yellan n wat Isṛail, iceggeɛ a d-awin Bulus, iwakken a sen-d-ihdeṛ ɣef wayen yeɛnan liman di Ɛisa Lmasiḥ.

Mi gebda Bulus iheddeṛ ɣef lḥeqq, ɣef wamek ilaq ad iḥkem wemdan deg iman-is, ɣef wass n lḥisab i d-iteddun, Filiks ikcem-it lxuf, yenna-yas : Dayen, tzemreḍ aț-țṛuḥeḍ tura. M'ara d-stifeɣ, a k-d-ssiwleɣ.
Imi i geḍmeɛ di Bulus a s-yefk idrimen, si teswiɛt ɣer tayeḍ issawal-as-ed iwakken ad ihdeṛ yid-es.
Ɛeddan sin n iseggasen ; dɣa Bursyus Fistus yuɣal d lḥakem deg wemkan n Filiks. Filiks-nni imi i gebɣa ad iɛǧeb i wat Isṛail, yeǧǧa Bulus di lḥebs.
Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan segmi yuɣal d lḥakem, Fistus yuli si temdint n Qiṣarya ɣer temdint n Lquds.
Dɣa lmuqedmin imeqqranen akk-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail, ccetkan ɣuṛ-es ɣef Bulus.
Ssutren i Fistus a sen-ixdem lemziya, a sen-d-yawi Bulus ɣer temdint n Lquds, nutni heggan-as-d taxazabit iwakken a t-nɣen deg webrid.
Lameɛna Fistus yerra-yasen : Bulus ițwaḥbes di Qiṣarya, nekk s yiman-iw qṛib ad uɣaleɣ ɣer dinna.
Xtiṛet-ed si gar-awen wid ara yeddun yid-i ; ma yella kra n wayen n diri i gexdem wergaz-agi, ad ccetkin fell-as.
Fistus isɛedda azal n tmanya neɣ ɛecṛa wussan gar-asen, taggara yuɣal ɣer Qiṣarya. Azekka-nni, iṭṭef amkan ɣef wukersi n ccṛeɛ, iceggeɛ a d-awin Bulus.
Mi d-yewweḍ Bulus, at Isṛail i d-yusan si temdint n Lquds zzin-as, gren-d fell-as lbaṭel, lameɛna ur zmiren ara a d-tebten wayen i d qqaṛen.
Bulus iḥudd iman-is yenna : Ur ɛuṣaɣ ccariɛa n wat Isṛail, ur skecmeɣ leḥṛam ɣer lǧameɛ iqedsen, ur xulfeɣ Qayṣer.
Imi gebɣa ad issefṛeḥ at Isṛail, Fistus yenna i Bulus : Tebɣiḍ aț-țaliḍ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken aț-țɛeddiḍ di ccṛeɛ dinna zdat-i ?
Lameɛna Bulus yenna : Ɣer ccṛeɛ n Qayṣer i beddeɣ, ɣuṛ-es ara țțucaṛɛeɣ. Ur xdimeɣ ula d acemma i gḍuṛṛen at Isṛail, akken teẓriḍ kečč s yiman-ik.

Ma yella xedmeɣ lbaṭel neɣ ayen yuklalen lmut, ur țțaggadeɣ ara ad mmteɣ. Lameɛna ma yella lecɣal-agi ɣef i d-ccetkan fell-i ur seḥḥan ara, yiwen ur izmir a yi-isellem ger ifassen-nsen. Ad rẓeɣ ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer !
Mi gemcawaṛ Fistus nețța ț-țejmaɛt-nni n ccṛeɛ, yenna i Bulus : Tessutreḍ-ed ccṛeɛ n Qayṣer, aț-țețțucarɛeḍ zdat Qayṣer !
Mi ɛeddan kra wussan, agellid Aɣribas akk-d weltma-s Birinis, usan-d ɣer Qiṣarya ad sellmen ɣef lḥakem Fistus.
Imi qqimen dinna kra wussan, Fistus iḥka-yas i ugellid-nni taqsiṭ n Bulus, yenna-yas : Yella yiwen wergaz i geǧǧa Filiks dagi d ameḥbus.
Mi lliɣ di temdint n Lquds, ccetkan fell-as imeqqranen n lmuqedmin d lɛuqal n wat Isṛail ; ssutren-iyi-d ad ḥekmeɣ fell-as.
Nniɣ-asen mačči di lɛadda n iṛumaniyen ad ḥekmen ɣef wemdan uqbel a t-semqabalen nețța d wid i d-iccetkan fell-as, iwakken ad yaf abrid amek ara idafeɛ ɣef yiman-is.
Ihi usan-d ɣer dagi. Ur ɛeṭṭleɣ ara, azekka-nni fkiɣ lameṛ a d-awin argaz-nni iwakken a t-sɛeddiɣ di ccṛeɛ ;
wid iccetkan fell-as ur d-nnin acemma seg wayen țrajuɣ a t-id-inin.
Țemjadalen anagar ɣef ddin akk-d yiwen ițusemman Ɛisa. Ɛisa-agi yemmut, meɛna Bulus yeqqaṛ-ed yedder.
Imi ur ẓriɣ ara acu ara xedmeɣ di temsalt-agi, nniɣ-as i Bulus ma yebɣa ad iṛuḥ ɣer temdint n Lquds iwakken ad ițțucaṛeɛ dinna,
lameɛna yerẓa ccṛeɛ iwakken ad ițțucaṛeɛ zdat Qayṣer ; dɣa fkiɣ lameṛ a t-ɛassen alamma d ass i deg ara t-ceggɛeɣ ɣer Qayṣer.S
Agellid Aɣribas yenna i Fistus : Bɣiɣ ula d nekk ad sleɣ i wergaz-agi. Fistus yenna-yas : Azekka a s-tesleḍ !

Azekka-nni agellid Aɣribas d weltma-s Birinis usan-d, cebbḥen-d iman-nsen, ṭṭfen amkan deg wexxam n ccṛeɛ nutni d lqebṭanat akk-d imeqqranen n temdint ; lḥakem Fistus yefka lameṛ a d-skecmen Bulus,
dɣa yenna : Ay agellid Aɣribas akk-d kunwi i gḥedṛen dagi ! Argaz-agi, d win akken i ɣef d-ccetkan wat Isṛail ama di temdint n Lquds ama dagi ; țɛeggiḍen qqaṛen : « ilaq ad immet »!
Ma d nekk, idheṛ-iyi-d lḥal ur ixdim ula d acemma yuklalen lmut ; imi nețța s yiman-is yerẓa ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer, qebleɣ a s-t-ceggɛeɣ.
Ur ufiɣ ula d yiwet n sebba iseḥḥan i ɣef ara ketbeɣ fell-as i Qayṣer ; daymi i t-id-sbeddeɣ zdat wen, ula zdat-ek ay agellid Aɣribas, iwakken m'ara t-beḥten ad yili wayen ara ketbeɣ fell-as.
Axaṭer walaɣ mačči d ṣṣwab ma ceggɛeɣ yiwen umeḥbus ɣer temdint n Ṛuma mbla ma fkiɣ-asen sebba s wayes i d ccetkan fell-as.
Aɣribas yenna i Bulus : -- Atan ɣuṛ-ek wawal, tzemreḍ aț-țdafɛeḍ ɣef yiman-ik. Bulus yerfed afus-is iwakken ad idafeɛ ɣef yiman-is, yenna :
Feṛḥeɣ aṭas ay agellid Aɣribas imi zdat-ek ara ɛeddiɣ di ccṛeɛ ass-agi ɣef wayen akk i ccetkan fell-i wat Isṛail,
axaṭer tesneḍ akken ilaq leɛwayed akk-d yimeslayen-nsen ; di leɛnaya-k ihi semḥess-iyi-d s leɛqel.
At Isṛail ssnen tikli-inu si temẓi-w, axaṭer țțuṛebbaɣ di temdint n Lquds ger warraw n tmurt-iw.
Ssnen-iyi si zik ma bɣan ad cehden fell-i. Lliɣ d afarizi, tebɛeɣ leqwanen iweɛṛen yeɛnan ddin-nneɣ di tejmaɛt n ifariziyen.
Beddeɣ ass-agi di ccṛeɛ axaṭer ssarmeɣ aț-țwakmel lemɛahda-nni i gefka Sidi Ṛebbi i lejdud-nneɣ.
Tnac leɛṛac-nneɣ i gɛebden Ṛebbi am yiḍ am ass, țṛaǧun a d-taweḍ lemɛahda-agi i ssaramen. Ɣef wusirem-agi i ccetkan wat Isṛail fell-i.
Ay agellid Aɣribas, acuɣeṛ i tɣilem d lmuḥal a d-isseḥyu Sidi Ṛebbi lmegtin ?
Ma d nekkini, di tazwara ɛeṛdeɣ ad xaṣmeɣ s wayen yellan di tezmert-iw, isem-agi n Ɛisa Anaṣari ;
d ayen i xedmeɣ di temdint n Lquds, rriɣ aṭas imasiḥiyen ɣer lḥebs, yerna d lmuqedmin imeqqranen i yi-d-yefkan țesriḥ-agi. M'ara ḥekkmen fell-asen s lmut, nekkini qebbleɣ ;
qehṛeɣ-ten acḥal d abrid si lǧameɛ ɣer wayeḍ, ḥeṛseɣ-ten ad ṭṭixṛen i webrid-agi n Ɛisa ; deg urrif-iw ameqqran, țṛuḥeɣ armi ț-țimdinin tibeṛṛaniyin iwakken a ten-qehhṛeɣ.
Ɣef wannect-nni lmuqedmin imeqqranen fkan-iyi tazmert s wayes ṛuḥeɣ ɣer temdint n Dimecq.
Taswiɛt kan di țnaṣfa wass ay agellid, walaɣ deg webrid yiwet n tafat i d-yekkan seg igenni, tețfeǧǧiǧ akteṛ n yiṭij, tezzi-yi-d i nekk akk-d wid yellan yid-i,
neɣli akk ɣer lqaɛa. Sliɣ i ṣṣut i d-iqqaṛen s tmeslayt taɛibṛanit : A Caɛul, a Caɛul ! Acuɣeṛ i yi tețqehhiṛeḍ ? Yewɛeṛ fell-ak aț-țɛaṣiḍ inezlan.
Rriɣ-as : Anwa-k a Sidi ? Yenna-yi-d : Nekkini d Ɛisa-nni i tețqehhiṛeḍ ;
kker fell-ak, bedd ɣef yidaṛṛen-ik, ḍehṛeɣ-ak-d iwakken a k-rreɣ d aqeddac-iw, d inigi ɣef wayen twalaḍ ass-agi d wayen ara k-d-sekneɣ sya d asawen.
Xtaṛeɣ-k-id si ger wat Isṛail akk-d leǧnas nniḍen uɣuṛ ara k ceggɛeɣ. A sen-teldiḍ allen
iwakken a d ffɣen si ṭṭlam ɣer tafat, si tezmert n Cciṭan ɣer tezmert n Ṛebbi, ad amnen yis-i, iwakken a sen-neɛfuɣ ddnubat-nsen, ad sɛun amkan ger wid i gextaṛ Sidi Ṛebbi.
Daymi, ay agellid Aɣribas, ur ɛuṣaɣ ara aweḥḥi i yi-d-yusan seg igenni.

Bdiɣ abecceṛ di temdint n Dimecq akk-d ț-țemdint n Lquds, beccṛeɣ daɣen di tmurt n Yahuda meṛṛa, di taggara, beccṛeɣ i wat leǧnas ur nelli ara seg wat Isṛail, nhiɣ-ten ad tuben, a d-uɣalen ɣer webrid n Ṛebbi, ad xedmen lecɣal i d-ițbegginen belli tuben s wul-nsen.
Ɣef wannect-agi i yi-ṭṭfen wat Isṛail deg wefrag n lǧameɛ iqedsen, ɛeṛden ad iyi-nɣen.
Lameɛna s lemɛawna n Sidi Ṛebbi, ddreɣ armi d ass-a, țbecciṛeɣ i yemdanen meṛṛa, ama d ameɣbun ama d ameṛkanti ; yerna ayen i d-qqaṛeɣ, d ayen akken i ɣef d-caren lenbiya akk-d Sidna Musa :
yeɛni Lmasiḥ ad iɛteb, d nețța i d amezwaru ara d-iḥyun si ger lmegtin, ad ibecceṛ tafat i wegdud n wat Isṛail akk-d leǧnas nniḍen.
Akken yella Bulus yețdafaɛ ɣef yiman-is, Fistus yenṭeq-ed s leɛyaḍ, yenna : Iffeɣ-ik leɛqel a Bulus ! Lketṛa n tmusni-inek tessufeɣ-ak leɛqel !
Bulus yerra-yas : Ur iyi-iffiɣ ara leɛqel a Fistus ameqqran ! Ayen akka i d-qqaṛeɣ d imeslayen n tideț yesɛan ṣṣwab.
Ula d agellid Aɣribas, yeɛlem s wayagi ; daymi i d-mmeslayeɣ zdat-es ɛinani, imi mačči s tuffra i gedṛa wannect-a.
Ay agellid, tumneḍ s wayen i d-nnan lenbiya ? Sriɣ tumneḍ yis-sen !
Aɣribas yenna i Bulus : Lemmer a yi-d ternuḍ kra yimeslayen ahat ad iyi-tqenɛeḍ ad uɣaleɣ d amasiḥi !
Bulus yenna-yas : A wi-yufan a Ṛebbi, mačči d keččini kan, lameɛna ula d wid akk i yi-d-ismeḥsisen ass-agi, aț-țuɣalem am nekk tura neɣ deg ussan i d-iteddun, ḥaca snasel-agi i yi cudden !
Dɣa agellid Aɣribas, lḥakem Fistus, Birinis d wid akk yeqqimen yid-sen, kkren-d.
Mi kkren ad ṛuḥen, nnan wway gar-asen : Argaz-agi ur ixdim ula d acemma yuklalen lmut neɣ lḥebs.
Aɣribas yenna i Fistus : Argaz-agi izmer ad ițțuserreḥ lemmer ur yerẓi ara ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer.
Mi fkan lameṛ a nerkeb lbabuṛ ɣer tmurt n Selyan, ǧǧan Bulus akk-d kra n imeḥbas nniḍen i yiwen ufesyan n terbaɛt n Qayṣer, isem-is Xulyus.
Nerkeb deg yiwen lbabuṛ n temdint n Adramit, ara iṛuḥen rrif n tmura n Asya ; nṛuḥ, yedda yid-nneɣ Aristaṛk yellan d amasiduni n temdint n Tiṣalunik.
Azekka-nni, newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sidun , Xulyus yețqadaṛen Bulus, ixdem-as lemziya, iserreḥ-as ad iṛuḥ ɣer imdukkal-is iwakken a s-d-fken ayen yeḥwaǧ.
Mi neqleɛ syenna, nɛedda rrif rrif n tegzirt n Qubṛus axaṭer iṣbeḥ-aɣ-d waḍu iǧehden si zdat.
Nezger lebḥeṛ n Silisya akk-d Bamfilya, newweḍ ɣer lmeṛṣa n Mira yellan di tmurt n Lizya.
Afesyan-nni yufa dinna lbabuṛ n Skandriya ara iṛuḥen ɣer tmurt n Selyan, isserkeb-aɣ deg-s.
Lbabuṛ nni yewwi-yaɣ kra n wussan s țțawil ; armi neṛwa leɛtab i newweḍ ɣer tama n temdint n Knidus, imi ur aɣ-yeǧǧi ara waḍu a nqeṛṛeb, nɛedda rrif n tegzirt n Kritus, ɣer tama n Salmuni.
Nkemmel rrif rrif s leɛtab, armi newweḍ ɣer yiwen wemkan isem-is « Lemraṣi icebḥen », zdat temdint n Lazaya.
Nesṛuḥ aṭas n lweqt, lweqt n usafer di lebḥeṛ yuɣal yewɛeṛ aṭas, imi ass i deg țțuẓummen wat Isṛail di taggara n lexṛif iɛedda.

Daymi i sen-iɛeggen Bulus yenna-yasen : Ay atmaten, ẓriɣ belli tikkelt-agi ma nkemmel aṣafeṛ-nneɣ, a d-tili lexsaṛa mačči kan i lbabuṛ d sselɛa yellan deg-s, lameɛna tezmer aț-țeglu ula yis-nneɣ.
Afesyan-nni aṛumani yuɣ awal i bab n lbabuṛ akk-d win i t-inehṛen wala ad yaɣ awal i Bulus.

Imi lmeṛṣa-nni ur telhi ara iwakken ad sɛeddin deg-s ccetwa, azgen ameqqran n ibeḥriyen bɣan ad ṛuḥen, iwakken ma yella wamek, ad awḍen ɣer lmeṛṣa n Finikus yellan di tegzirt n Kritus ; lmeṛṣa-yagi tqubel lǧiha taɣeṛbit, bɣan ad sɛeddin deg-s ccetwa.
Akken i d-yekker yiwen ubeḥri xfifen, ɣilen ad awḍen ɣer leqsed nsen. Refden amextaf n lbabuṛ, ṛuḥen rrif rrif n tegzirt n Kritus.
Lameɛna ur tɛeṭṭel ara tekker-ed yiwet n tbuciḍant iwumi qqaṛen Erakilun i d-ikkan seg idurar n tegzirt-nni.
Imi lbabuṛ ur s-izmir ara i tbuciḍant-nni, neǧǧa-t a t-yawi waḍu ɣer wanda i s-yehwa,
nɛedda seddaw yiwet n tegzirt tamecṭuḥt yeddurin ɣef waḍu, isem-is Kluda. Mi ɣ-teɣli teflukt-nni n leslak, s leɛtab ameqqran i ț-id-nessuli ɣer lbabuṛ.
Imi nuggad a ɣ-yawi waḍu ɣer leryuf iweɛṛen n tmurt n Libya, ncudd lbabuṛ s imurar ; nerna nṣubb-ed lbac-nni s wayes i t-yețțawi waḍu, neǧǧa iman-nneɣ a ɣ-yawi ɣer wanda yebɣa.
Azekka-nni, imi mazal lebḥeṛ yenhewwal, nessenqes kra n sselɛa yellan deg-s nḍeggeṛ-iț ɣer lebḥeṛ.
Ass wis tlata, ixeddamen n lbabuṛ rnan ḍeggṛen sselɛa-nni i d-iqqimen.
Acḥal n wussan ur d-iban yiṭij ur d-banen itran, lebḥeṛ mazal-it yerwi, ur numin ara a nțwasellek.

Aṭas wussan i neqqim mbla lmakla ; dɣa Bulus ibedd-ed gar-asen yenna : Ay irgazen, lemmer i yi-tuɣem awal m'akken i wen-d-nniɣ : a neqqim axiṛ di lmeṛṣa n Kritus, tili ur d-tdeṛṛu ara lexsaṛa akk-d lxuf-agi !
Tura ur țțagadet ara, sǧehdet iman-nwen axaṭer ula d yiwen deg-wen ur ițmețțat ; ur d-tețțili lexsaṛa anagar lbabuṛ-agi ara iɣeṛqen.
Iḍ iɛeddan, Sidi Ṛebbi i ɛebbdeɣ iceggeɛ-ed yiwen lmelk ibedd-ed ɣuṛ-i
yenna-yi-d : « a Bulus, ur țțaggad ara ! Ilaq aț-țbeddeḍ zdat Qayṣer, atan Sidi Ṛebbi a kkun isellek s kečč s wid yellan yid-ek ».
Sewṛet ihi ay atmaten ! Țekleɣ ɣef Ṛebbi ad idṛu am akken i d-yenna ;
mbla ccekk ihi a ɣ-ḍeggṛent lemwaji ɣer yiwet n tegzirt.
Iḍ wis ṛbeɛṭac, mazal aḍu yețhuccu-yaɣ ițțawi-yaɣ akkin akka ɣef lebḥeṛ Agrakal ; di țnaṣfa n yiḍ, ibeḥṛiyen ḥussen belli ur bɛiden ara ɣef lberr.
Ktalen lqaɛ n lebḥeṛ s wemrar, ufan llant
Imi uggaden lbabuṛ a t-id-iḥaz kra seddaw-as, ḍeggṛen ṛebɛa imextafen ɣer deffir n lbabuṛ, tqelqen melmi ara yali wass.
Lameɛna ixeddamen n lbabuṛ țqelliben ad rewlen ; ṣubben taflukt n leslak ɣer lebḥeṛ, steɛmilen am akken d amextaf ara ḍeggṛen ɣer zdat lbabuṛ.
Dɣa Bulus yenna i lqebṭan d lɛeskeṛ-is : M'ur qqimen ara yergazen-agi di lbabuṛ, ur tezmirem ara aț-țmenɛem ! S
Imiren lɛeskeṛ gezmen imurar n teflukt, ǧǧan-ț aț-țeɣli ɣer lebḥeṛ.
Weqbel ad yali wass, Bulus inha-ten akk ad ččen cwiṭ n lqut, yenna : Ass-agi d ass wis ṛbeɛṭac ur teɛṛiḍem lqut.
Tura nhiɣ-kkun ihi aț-țeččem iwakken aț-țețțusellkem, ula d yiwen deg-wen ur s-ițṛuḥ wenẓad seg uqeṛṛuy.
Mi d-yenna ayagi, iddem-ed aɣṛum, iḥmed Ṛebbi zdat-sen meṛṛa, yebḍa-t, yebda itețț.
Yekkes-asen akk lxuf dɣa ččan.
Mi ččan armi ṛwan, ḍeggṛen ɣer lebḥeṛ ticekkaṛin n yirden, iwakken ad yifsus lbabuṛ.
Mi guli wass, ur eɛqilen ara maḍi tamurt-nni anda wwḍen. Lameɛna walan yiwen wemkan iqeṛben, iban-ed deg-s ṛṛmel, bɣan ad rren lbabuṛ ɣer dinna ma yella wamek.

Fsin imurar i imextafen bran asen ɣer lebḥeṛ, fsin daɣen imurar i imeqdafen s wacu nehṛen lbabuṛ ; dɣa ssulin yiwen ubeḥnuq yellan ɣer zdat n lbabuṛ iwakken a ten-yawi waḍu ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ.
Lameɛna wwḍen ɣer yiwen wemkan n ṛṛmel iwumi d-izzi lebḥeṛ ; rran ɣer dinna lbabuṛ-nni, lǧiha n zdat teḥṣel di ṛṛmel teḥbes ma d lǧiha n deffir tebda tețṛuẓu si lqewwa n lemwaji.
Lɛeskeṛ bɣan ad nɣen imeḥbas-nni axaṭer uggaden a sen-rewlen s lɛum.
Lqebṭan-nni i gebɣan ad isellek Bulus, ur ten-yeǧǧi ara ad xedmen lebɣi-nsen. Yefka lameṛ i wid yessnen ad ɛummen, ad ḍeggṛen iman-nsen d imezwura ɣer waman iwakken ad awḍen ɣer rrif.
Ma d wiyaḍ a ten-tebɛen, ad ṭṭfen di telwiḥin neɣ deg iceqfan n lbabuṛ. S wakka, wwḍen meṛṛa ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ di laman.
Mi d-nemneɛ si lebḥeṛ, nesla belli tigzirt-nni isem-is Malṭa.
Imezdaɣ-is setṛeḥben yis-nneɣ, xedmen-aɣ lxiṛ d ameqqran ; ceɛlen times axaṭer yekkat ugeffur ( lehwa ), yerna d asemmiḍ.
Bulus ijmeɛ-ed kra n yesɣaṛen a ten-iger ɣer tmes, si leḥmu-nni n tmes yeffeɣ-ed yiwen n wezrem yenṭed deg ufus-is.

Lɣaci mi walan azrem-nni yeckenṭeḍ deg ufus-is, qqaṛen wway gar-asen : « Argaz-agi iban d bu tmegṛaḍ, axaṭer ɣas akken yemneɛ-ed si lebḥeṛ, Sidi Ṛebbi yellan d Bab n lḥeqq ur t-yețțaǧa ara ad yidir. »
Lameɛna Bulus yezwi azrem-nni ɣer tmes, ur t-yuɣ ula d acemma ;
lɣaci-nni țṛaǧun a t-walin ibzeg neɣ ad yemmet imiren kan. Ɛussen-t, mi walan ur t-yuɣ wacemma, beddlen ṛṛay, ḥesben-t d yiwen seg iṛebbiten s wayes țțamnen.
Di leǧwahi-nni i gezdeɣ Bubliyus lḥakem ameqqran n tegzirt-nni ; yesɛa aṭas n wakal, yesṭerḥeb yis-nneɣ, yerna yessens-aɣ ɣuṛ-es tlata wussan.
Deg ussan-nni, baba-s n Bubliyus yella deg usu yehlek, tuɣ-it tawla yerna tuzzel tɛebbuṭ-is. Bulus iṛuḥ ɣuṛ-es, issers ifassen-is fell-as, yedɛa ɣer Sidi Ṛebbi dɣa yeḥla.
Mi slan yis imuḍan n tegzirt-nni usan-d ɣuṛ-es isseḥla-ten ula d nutni.
Ɣef wayagi, qudṛen-aɣ aṭas ; mi nekker a nṛuḥ, fkan-aɣ-d ayen akk neḥwaǧ i webrid.
Mi ɛeddan tlata waguren, nerkeb yiwen lbabuṛ n temdint n Skandriya iwumi qqaṛen Dyuskuṛ, isɛeddan ccetwa di tegzirt-nni ;
newweḍ ɣer temdint n Sirakuz, anda neqqim tlata wussan.
Syenna nkemmel rrif rrif n lebḥeṛ armi ț-țamdint n Ṛejyu, azekka-nni yekker-ed yiwen n waḍu i d-yekkan seg usamer, sin wussan mbeɛd, newweḍ ɣer temdint n Buzul.
Nufa dinna atmaten i ɣ iḥellelen a neqqim yid-sen sebɛa wussan, syenna nkemmel abrid ɣer temdint n Ṛuma.

Mi slan yis-nneɣ watmaten n temdint n Ṛuma, usan-d armi d ssuq n Abyus akk-d wemkan yețțusemman « Tlata Țbernat » iwakken a ɣ-d-mmagren. Mi ten iwala Bulus, yefṛeḥ yeḥmed Ṛebbi yerna yuɣal-it-id lǧehd.
Mi newweḍ ɣer temdint n Ṛuma, serrḥen-as i Bulus ad izdeɣ deg yiwen wexxam, nețța d yiwen uɛeskṛi i t yețɛassan.

Mi ɛeddan tlata wussan, Bulus yessawel i imeqqranen n wat Isṛail. Mi d-nnejmaɛen, Bulus yenna yasen : Ay atmaten, ɣas akken ur xdimeɣ acemma i gxulfen agdud d leɛwayed n lejdud-nneɣ, ṭṭfen-iyi ɣer lḥebs di temdint n Lquds, sellmen-iyi ger ifassen n lɛeskeṛ n Ṛuman.
Mi yi-beḥten, bɣan ad iyi serrḥen axaṭer ur ufin ara deg-i sebba s wayes ara ḥekmen fell-i s lmut.
Imi ur qbilen ara wat Isṛail ad iyi-d-serrḥen iṛumaniyen, iḥettem-iyi lḥal ad rẓeɣ ccṛeɛ ɣer Qayṣer ; lameɛna mačči d acetki i bɣiɣ ad ccetkiɣ ɣef wegdud-iw.
Daymi i bɣiɣ a kkun-ẓreɣ, ad mmeslayeɣ yid-wen axaṭer ɣef ddemma n usirem n wat Isṛail i țwarzeɣ s snasel-agi.

Imeqqranen n wat Isṛail nnan-as : Ur d-neṭṭif ula d yiwet n tebṛaț si tmurt n Yahuda ɣef wayen yeɛnan tamsalt-ik, ula d yiwen seg watmaten ur d-yusi ad iccetki neɣ a ɣ-d-yini ayen n diri fell-ak.
Lameɛna nebɣa a nsel s ɣuṛ-ek ayen akka s wacu i tumneḍ, ma d ayen yeɛnan tajmaɛt-agi seg i d-tekkiḍ, neẓra belli di yal amkan tețmagar-ed uguren.

Dɣa msefhamen ɣef wass nniḍen i deg ara mlilen. Mi d yewweḍ wass-nni, usan-d deg waṭas yid-sen ɣer wexxam n Bulus. Si ṣṣbeḥ armi ț-țameddit, Bulus yețbecciṛ-asen ɣef tgeldit n Ṛebbi s ccariɛa n Musa ț-țektabin n lenbiya, yețqellib a ten-iqenneɛ iwakken ad amnen s Sidna Ɛisa.
Kra umnen s wayen i d-yenna, ma d wiyaḍ ugin ad amnen.
Mi țeddun ad ṛuḥen mazal lxilaf gar-asen, dɣa Bulus yerna-yasen imeslayen-agi : Ț-țideț ayen i d-yenna Ṛṛuḥ iqedsen i lejdud-nwen s yimi n nnbi Iceɛya
mi d-yenna : Ṛuḥ ɣer wegdud-agi tiniḍ-asen : ɣas aț-țeslem s imeẓẓuɣen-nwen ur tfehmem ara ; aț-țemmuqlem s wallen-nwen ur tețwalim ara,

imi ul n wegdud-agi yuɣal d azṛu ; qeflen imeẓẓuɣen-nsen, qemcen allen-nsen ; ur bɣin ara ad walin s wallen-nsen, d slen s imeẓẓuɣen-nsen, ad fehmen s wul-nsen, iwakken a d-uɣalen ɣuṛ-i ad beddlen tikli akken a ten-sseḥluɣ !
Atan ihi tura leslak n Sidi Ṛebbi ad ițțunefk i leǧnas nniḍenur nelli ara n wat Isṛail axaṭer nutni a s-semḥessen yerna a t-qeblen.
Mi d-yenna Bulus ayagi, ffɣen-d imeqqranen n wat Isṛail, leḥḥun țemjadalen wway gar-asen.
Bulus yeqqim sin iseggasen deg wexxam-nni i gekra. Isṭerḥib s kra n win i d-yețțasen a t-iẓer.
Yețbecciṛ tageldit n Ṛebbi s tlelli, isselmad-asen ayen akk yeɛnan Sidna Ɛisa Lmasiḥ, ulac win i t-iḥebsen.
